overview:
Marketing Executive with proven success in growing revenue, procuring new business objectives and aligning creative with analytic metrics. Highly successful at building cross-platform marketing plans and Customer Relationship plans that extend brand reach through interactive, TV, print, and social media. Successful at leading and motivating creative teams of 12+. Ability to orchestrate strategic partners, producers, and vendors. Excellent written, verbal and hands-on skills.

Deep knowledge and proven results in Retail, CPG and Broadcast Media.

Specialties Interactive • Social Media Strategies • Multichannel Marketing • Retail • Apparel • TV • Online Advertising Campaigns • Loyalty & Retention Programs • Acquisition • Broadcast • Digital Media • E-Commerce • B2C • B2B • Direct • Creative Campaign Writer • Re-Brandings • Relaunches • Start-ups
